scripts.start-e2e-ios-sampleapp: export $(./scripts/get_env.sh e2eiOS | xargs) && npx react-native start
scripts.start-e2e-android-sampleapp: export $(./scripts/get_env.sh e2eAndroid | xargs) && npx react-native start
scripts.test-e2e-ios-debug-sampleapp: detox build -c ios.sim.debug.sampleapp && detox test -c ios.sim.debug.sampleapp -o e2eiOS/config.json
scripts.test-e2e-android-debug-sampleapp: detox build -c android.emu.debug.sampleapp && detox test -c android.emu.debug.sampleapp -o e2eAndroid/config.json
scripts.test-e2e-ios-release-sampleapp: detox build -c ios.sim.release.sampleapp && detox test -c ios.sim.release.sampleapp -o e2eiOS/config.json
scripts.test-e2e-android-release-sampleapp: detox build -c android.emu.release.sampleapp && detox test -c android.emu.release.sampleapp -o e2eAndroid/config.json

ios.sim.debug.sampleapp.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/SampleApp.xcworkspace -scheme SampleApp -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.debug.sampleapp.name: iPhone 8

ios.sim.release.sampleapp.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/SampleApp.xcworkspace -scheme SampleApp -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.release.sampleapp.name: iPhone 8
